items.preText: Monjur Hassan: "Is there any rule for bowlers to bowl round or over the wicket?" - No rule. West Indies have so far bowled round the wicket to Tamim and over the wicket to Liton.
items.text: too far down leg and he's been wided
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: gets his line right, straighter that time. Good bounce from back of a length. He fends it down off the front foot
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: loses his line again. Too far down leg and another wide. West Indies don't have the runs to play with to be able to afford these extras
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: back of a length outside off, but given some room and Tamim cuts it past point. Didn't get the timing spot on but gets a couple
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: keeps low short ball on the stumps, doesn't rise at all. Tamim was set to pull, eventually has to adjust fast and pull it off his waist to deep midwicket.
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: another wide he couldn't get his line right against Tamim, but against the right-handed Liton too he's bowled it too far down leg
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, 1 wide

items.text: back of a length on off, stays back and guides it to third man, past a diving wide slip
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: back of a length angling into the batsman, he taps it down to the bowler's left
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: comes down the track, but the bowler shortened his length. Liton has to eventually play it down to short fine
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.text: down the track again and lifts it over the in-field. Bounces well short of deep midwicket though
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: good length on the stumps and spinning away, Tamim punches it back
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on the stumps, stays back and drives to mid-on
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length, gets it to bounce. Tamim goes deep in his crease to punch to cover
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: too short, and Tamim rocks back to pull, but sends it too high. Lands safely though between long on and midwicket
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length and nipping back into the batsman wh ocomes forward to defend, but gets an inside edge onto pad
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short ball, doesnt rise, Tamim pulls it to deep square leg. He was expecting it to bounce higher, adjusted well to pull
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: very full, trying for the yorker. Doesn't quite get it, but Liton doesn't get hold of it either. Driven to mid-on
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.text: flicks it straight to deep square leg full length on the stumps, tempts him into playing it in the air and he picks out Shimron Hetmyer perfectly. Ooh but what do we have here? This could be a no-ball It's very tight, and it looks like Roach doesn't have anything behind the line. It's touch and go however. The third umpire is taking his time with this one. One team is going to feel hard done by, by the decision. And it's a no-ball! Right decision in the end I think. Liton gets a lease of life, and Bangladesh get a free hit
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, 1 no ball

items.preText: Roach has already been liberal with wides. Now he gets a wicket off a no-ball. Poor from West Indies
items.text: short ball into the body, he went for it, but didn't connect
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.text: bowls on the pads and is clipped to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: short ball, sat up for Tamim, who rocked back and pulled to deep midwicket. Keemo Paul ran around from deep square leg to collect it
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: nails the sweep too full, goes down on on knee to take it from outside off, hits it with the turn to the square leg fence
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: that went on straight. Liton poked at it, playing for the turn but it beats his outside edge
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.text: paddle-slogged for four goes down on one knee, the ball is short and he helps it to the fine leg fence again with the turn
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: stays back and slashes it past point that time. Went in the air, but the placement was safe. Liton is accelerating nicely here
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, 2 runs
